Parameters.Name: dsl
Parameters.Value:
${
                                    (
                                        ((entity.Urgency == 'SevereDisruption' || entity.Urgency == 'SlightDisruption')  && entity.ImpactScope == 'MultipleUsers')
                                        ||
                                        ((entity.Urgency == 'SevereDisruption' || entity.Urgency == 'TotalLossOfService') &&  entity.ImpactScope == 'SingleUser')
                                        ||
                                        ((entity.Urgency == 'SlightDisruption' || entity.Urgency == 'NoDisruption')  && entity.ImpactScope == 'SiteOrDepartment')
                                        ||
                                        (entity.Urgency == 'NoDisruption'  &&  entity.ImpactScope == 'Enterprise')
                                    )
                            }
